docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Every year millions of unsuspecting Americans, from children in school to the elderly in nursing homes, work with art materials that could endanger their health. But rarely are they properly protected from the potentially harmful ingredients. Indeed, rarely are they or their instructors even aware of the risks.
